Package it.polimi.ingsw.View.Utility.DebuggingTools

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ANSIDebug
    ANSIDebug abstract Class contains colors and styles to be used by the Debugger Classes when printing debug information.
    CliControllerDebugger
    CliControllerDebugger Class defines data and methods used to print debugging information inside a CliController Object.
    CliDebugger
    CliDebugger Class defines data and methods used to print debugging information inside a Cli Object.
    ClientConnectionDebugger
    ClientConnectionDebugger Class defines data and methods used to print debugging information inside a ClientConnection Object.
    ClientDebugger
    ClientDebugger Class defines data and methods used to print debugging information inside a Client Object.
    ControllerDebugger
    ControllerDebugger Class defines data and methods used to print debugging information inside a Controller Object.
    Debugger
    Debugger Class defines common data and methods used to print debugging information.
    DebuggerFactory
    DebuggerFactory Class contains a method used to generate a Debugger sub-class.
    ModelDebugger
    ModelDebugger Class defines data and methods used to print debugging information inside a Model Object.
    ServerConnectionDebugger
    ServerConnectionDebugger Class defines data and methods used to print debugging information inside a ServerConnection Object.
    ServerDebugger
    ServerDebugger Class defines data and methods used to print debugging information inside a Server Object.
    ServerMessageHandlerDebugger
    ServerMessageHandlerDebugger Class defines data and methods used to print debugging information inside a ServerMessageHandler Object.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    DebuggerType
    Defines all possible Debuggers which can be used by the Program.
